remarks.para: May be inoperative provided the aircraft is not operated in known or forecast precipitation within 5 statute miles of the airport of departure or intended landing.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 1.
Operation in precipitation within 5 statute miles of the airport of departure or intended landing is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard on Anti-Ice Rain Removal Panel (P5): "CAPT’s and/or F/O’s WINDSHIELD WIPER(S) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
